text:
Good morning, Meguru.
You're up pretty early.

Hehe
I woke up while it was still dark.

I went for a walk around the camp!
It felt so refreshing and nice!

So, I thought I'd do some
self-training while I'm at it!

I see.
You're really itching to move your body, huh?

Yeah!
But it felt lonely doing it alone...

Speaking of which, Producer,
you were here before me, right...?

Oh...
I do a quick check every morning.

I don't want anything to interfere with everyone's lessons,
and it would be troublesome if something happened.

Producer...
You've been silently watching over us...

Haha, that's too much.
It's nothing worth praising.

No, it's not!
Waking up early and doing all this is tough...
